Sadhguru in Dubai
Book Launch
Inner Engineering: A Yogi's Guide to Joy.
 

Isha Foundation is pleased to announce that Sadhguru’s book, Inner Engineering: A Yogi’s Guide to Joy was published by Spiegel & Grau/Random House on September 20, 2016. For the first time, Sadhguru will present Gulf readers with a path to achieving absolute well-being through the classical science of yoga in a practical, accessible book. It is a means to create inner situations exactly the way you want them, turning you into the architect of your own joy.

In this transformative book Sadhguru tells the story of his own awakening, from a boy with an affinity for the natural world, to a young daredevil who crossed the Indian continent on his motorcycle. He relates the moment of his enlightenment on a mountaintop in southern India, from which he emerged radically changed. Today, as the founder of Isha, he lights the path for millions. The wisdom distilled in this accessible, profound, and engaging book offers readers the opportunity to achieve nothing less than a life of joy.

My aim in this book is to help make joy your constant companion. To make that happen, this book offers you not a sermon, but a science; not a teaching, but a technology; not a precept, but a path.

- Sadhguru

As Sadhguru mentioned, reading this book (New York Times Bestseller) is like going through Inner Engineering program. So, this is a very powerful tool of reaching out to many others who may not step into a program.

We are making this book Available to you and your family and friends outside Hall 1, Dubai World Trade Center between 5pm to 6pm on Friday, 17th March 2017 at a special price*
